## ResolverBuilder.instance() method

Creates a resolver for an existing object instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
instance(value: K): Resolver<K>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | K | The instance to resolve. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Resolver](./fast-foundation.resolver.md)<!-- -->&lt;K&gt;

The resolver.
